Sequence Information.Source: Streptococcus mutans CH43); also Streptococcus mutans UA140 (Gram-positive bacteria)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the type A lantibiotic family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus, Staphylococcus epidermidis, enterococci, pneumococci, group A streptococci.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Purification and biochemical characterization of mutacin I from the group I strain of Streptococcus mutans, CH43, and genetic analysis of mutacin I biosynthesis genes.
Literature.Author: Qi F, Chen P, Caufield PW.

Literature.Title: The group I strain of Streptococcus mutans, UA140, produces both the lantibiotic mutacin I and a nonlantibiotic bacteriocin, mutacin IV.
Literature.Author: Qi F, Chen P, Caufield PW.
